name: [V2.0]Artist: 阿戈魔AGM | AGM artist's painting style
description:
阿戈魔AGM Style LoRA V2

仿阿戈魔AGM的作画风格的LORA模型，画面干净，瞳孔明亮，画风偏立体，有肉感。

权重建议值：0.8 (or 0.5~1)

基于模型：CreationMixV1 Trimmed

训练信息：共计540张原画，迭代1080步。

The LoRA model mimics AGM's painting style, which is clean with bright pupils and a three-dimensional style with a sense of fleshiness.

Recommended weight value: 1 (or 0.5~1)

Based on model: CreationMixV1 Trimmed

Training information:

A total of 540 original paintings with 1080 iterations.

使用全新的训练模式以提升模型质量。

Use new training modes to improve model quality.
